product_name: Blue Orange Spot It! Card Game
long_description: The fast-action matching Blue Orange Spot it! card game requires only a sharp eye and quick reflexes to play. Five different scenarios are easy to learn and fun for all ages. Improves visual perception, focus and reaction time. Comes with 55 cards and illustrated rules.
short_description: The fast-action matching Blue Orange Spot it! card game requires only a sharp eye and quick reflexes to play. Five different scenarios are easy to learn and fun for all ages.
